abstract: A survey by a professor at Fordham University finds that the protesters are "disgruntled Democrats."
snippet: A survey by a professor at Fordham University finds that the protesters are "disgruntled Democrats."
lead_paragraph: Zuccotti Park in New York's financial district is decked out with posters and signs for the wide array of political viewpoints of the Occupy Wall Street protesters. The six-week-old movement has several Web sites to promote various perspectives. But just who are these protesters? What is their political ideology? Do they have jobs?

headline.main: Occupy Protesters Down on Obama, Survey Finds
